original_text: Only Luke is with me now. Bring Mark with you when you come. He can help me very much with the work for God.
korean_text: 누가만 나와 함께 있느니라 네가 올 때에 마가를 데리고 오라 그가 나의 일에 유익하니라

sentences.original_text: Only Luke is with me now
Bring Mark with you when you come
He can help me very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 많이 도와줄 수 있습니다
